title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Cook bacon until crispy. Combine all ingredients and season with black pepper.
